p.span: Dear Rangers. As you are well aware, schools will be closeduntil further notice. Our first concern is for our students, staff, and community to remain calm and prepare for this unforeseen circumstance. We will be communicating via social media outlets and the website to keep you informed.
Please CLICK HERE to view a thank-you letterpresented by Forest Hills Senior School BoardClass Representative Kelsey Josephson at the April School Board of Directors Meeting.
Please read the Phase 3 Letter regarding the Forest Hills Continuity of Education Plan.
Please read the Forest Hills School District's statement regarding school closure.
Please read the Forest Hills School District's updated statement from March 31, 2020.

March 26, A.M.
Last evening Secretary of Education Pedro Rivera updated guidance to school districts concerning school closures.
CLICK HEREfor the latest guidance.
Watch for continuing updates from the PDEhere.

*Pre-K and Kindergarten Registration will be postponed until a later date due to the state-ordered shutdown. Please note that when the new Pre-K and Kindergarten dates are finalized, the information will be communicated on the District's webpage and its social media forums.
